document_data.name: Culk
document_data.mainbody: Booyagh '''Culk''' was a [[goblin]] spellcaster and [[cult of the Absolute|cultist]] of the [[Absolute]], who served his goddess during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Culk had yellow-brown skin and brown hair he wore swept back. He wore a crude hide-and-leather harness, decorated with feathers and bones.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the [[cult of the Absolute]] at the [[Shattered Sanctum]] launched a terrible raid on the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. The goblins of the Sanctum returned home to celebrate the raid with a great feast of roasted meat and generous amounts of [[ale]]. Booyagh Culk and several others drank far too much and passed out along the upper courtyard of the ruined temple.
